channel.title: Question about the sound effects
channel.description: Just a question for the lead sound designer here, were all the sound effects new recordings, or were they from libraries and websites? All of it is really well done, and I was wondering how it was achieved.

item.title: Question about the sound effects
item.dc:creator: Xyos
item.description:
Agree voice acting and sound was amazing! Would love to see you guys do blogs or some sort of articles telling us how the development process went.

Read full topic
